oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, Robert O., 1916 September 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Robert O. Allen, Lawyer, dated April 24th, 1902, with a codicil dated November 2nd, 1914. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allen’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on September 12th, 1916. The lawyer’s office address on the letterhead is “Room 24, Steger Building, 161 N. Cherry St., Nashville, Tenn.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
